valid: For the period 06:00 (UTC) on Thu 18 Sep 2025 to 06:00 (UTC) on Fri 19 Sep 2025
general_synopsis: Low Hebrides 983 moving steadily northeast and losing its identity by midnight tonight. New low expected 100 miles west of Rockall 992 by same time
